title: Near Spring Mountain Shopping, Chandll Is the Community For You
app_fee: $50 Dollar Credit Check Fee per Adult.
posting_body: ['Chandll Apartments is a beautiful community that welcomes you home with no deposits OAC!', 'Come on in to our office', 'OR', 'Apply online by copy and pasting this URL into your address bar -', '<URL>/', 'We offer 1 and 2 bedroom spacious floor plans with utilities included*.', ' Come relax on the pools sundeck while doing daily chores in our on-site laundry facilities.', 'We are located within walking distance to dining, shopping and Vegas style entertainment.', 'Imagine living in a beautiful environment without anything to disturb your perfect day.', 'You will love the lush mature and well-manicured lawns.', 'If you enjoy the outdoor setting, our picnic tables and barbecues are a great place to spend some time relaxing or socializing with friends and family.', 'You may also enjoy joining in on a game of cards, playing a board game, or just relaxing in the comfort of the clubhouse socializing with friends and family.', 'Call today to see how our courteous and friendly staff can help you find your next apartment home.', 'If you enjoy exceptional customer service and being treated the way you deserve to be treated, then you will make Chandll Apartments your new home.', 'No Deposit OAC!', 'Standard Units', '1x1 $1,016 Includes: Water, Sewer, and Trash*', 'Upgraded Units', '2x2 $1,466 Includes: Water, Sewer, and Trash*', 'Properties Amenities such as:', "•\tCommunity picnic areas with BBQ's", '•\t24 Hour Laundry Facility', '•\t24 Hour Emergency Maintenance', '•\tSparkling Pool w/Sundeck', '•\tWater, Sewer and Trash Included', '•\tLarge Walk-In Closets (In select units)', '•\tAssigned Parking', '•\tComplimentary Coffee & Sweets', '•\tCommunity Library and Game Room', 'And so much more...', 'Chandll Apartments', '4371 Sirius Ave.', 'Las Vegas, NV 89102', 'show contact info']
